dataflow.name: future_pred_with_analysis_id
dataflow.definition:
{"name":"future_pred_with_analysis_id  ","description":"","version":0,"parameters":"[{"name":"limit_rows","defValueInInteractiveMode":"limit 1000","defValueInBatchMode":"limit 10"},{"name":"future_forecast","defValueInInteractiveMode":"10","defValueInBatchMode":"10"},{"name":"Analysis_ID","defValueInInteractiveMode":"23e80e50-4797-21b8-b442-beaf7a3e4c99","defValueInBatchMode":"23e80e50-4797-21b8-b442-beaf7a3e4c99"}]","livyServerId":0,"engineVariableName":"","components":[{"udfNames":[],"componentId":0,"componentName":"startComponent","tableName":"","category":"Start","componentType":"UDF","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.UDFComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"dbScripts":[{"script":"do $$
begin
declare
v_script character varying;
partition_tab_name character varying(50);
v_count numeric;
begin
            SELECT REPLACE ('$[Analysis_ID]', '-', '_') into partition_tab_name;

 

 

 

v_script:='select count(*)  from pg_class where relname = ''t_dm_prediction_stg_'||partition_tab_name||'''';
execute v_script into v_count;

 

 

 

if(v_count>0)
then
v_script := 'TRUNCATE table t_dm_prediction_stg_'||partition_tab_name;
execute v_script;
ELSE
v_script := 'CREATE TABLE t_dm_prediction_stg_'||partition_tab_name||' PARTITION OF T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG FOR VALUES IN ('||'''$[Analysis_ID]'''||')';
execute v_script;
end if;

 

 

 


v_script:='select count(*)  from pg_class where relname = ''t_dm_prediction_'||partition_tab_name||'''';
execute v_script into v_count; 

 

 

if(v_count>0)
then
v_script := 'TRUNCATE table t_dm_prediction_'||partition_tab_name;
execute v_script;
ELSE
v_script := 'CREATE TABLE t_dm_prediction_'||partition_tab_name||' PARTITION OF T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION FOR VALUES IN ('||'''$[Analysis_ID]'''||')';
execute v_script;
end if;
commit;
end;
end$$;","executionOrder":1,"title":""}],"componentId":1,"componentName":"Truncate_stg_table","tableName":"Truncate_stg_table","category":"Processor","componentType":"DB script","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBScriptComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"enableTrim":"N","componentId":2,"componentName":"Read_Data_for_Time_series","tableName":"Read_Data_for_Time_series","category":"Source","componentType":"JDBC","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[1],"options":{"dbTable":"select * from (
select ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID, ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ACTUAL_VALUE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then AP.PREDICTION_TYPE else MP.PREDICTION_TYPE end as PREDICTION_TYPE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_DEF else M.PREDICTION_DEF end as PREDICTION_METH_DEF,
AR.RUN_DATE,
count(ARD.ANALYSIS_DETAIL_RUN_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID) as ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT
from
T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN_DETAILS ARD,T_DM_ANALYSIS_MEASURE M, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD AP, T_DM_ANALYSIS A,T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN AR, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD MP
where
AR.ANALYSIS_ID=A.ANALYSIS_ID
and ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID=M.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = MP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = AP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID=ARD.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_ID=M.ANALYSIS_ID
and A.ENABLE_PREDICTION='Y'
and A.ANALYSIS_ID='$[Analysis_ID]'
AND  ARD.ANALYSIS_ID='$[Analysis_ID]'
--and A.df_id = case when '$[Dataflow_ID]' = 'All Analysis' then A.df_id else '$[Dataflow_ID]' end
and (case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_ID else M.PREDICTION_METH_ID end) = 3
and (ARD.PREDICTION_USE='Y' AND AR.PREDICTION_USE='Y')
and ARD.ACTUAL_VALUE is not null
) a where ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT > CAST (( case when PREDICTION_METH_DEF like '%minDataPoints%' then (PREDICTION_METH_DEF::jsonb -> 'minDataPoints') else '15' end) as numeric) "},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","excludeNotification":"N"},{"code":"from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pandas as pd
from prophet import Prophet
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType,StructField,StringType,TimestampType,ArrayType,DoubleType
from pyspark.sql.functions import current_date, countDistinct
from pyspark.sql.functions import pandas_udf, PandasUDFType
from pyspark import StorageLevel 
from datetime import datetime
import ast
import distutils
import distutils.util

sql_statement = '''
  SELECT
    '$[Analysis_ID]' as analysis_id,
    analysis_measure_id,
    category,
    first(prediction_meth_def) as json_def,
    CAST(run_date as date) as ds,
    CAST(SUM(actual_value) as Int) as y
  FROM Read_Data_for_Time_series
  GROUP BY analysis_measure_id,category, run_date
  ORDER BY analysis_measure_id,category, run_date
  '''
 
time_series_data = (
  spark
    .sql( sql_statement )
    .repartition(sc.defaultParallelism, ['analysis_measure_id','category'])
  ).cache()
  
time_series_data.createOrReplaceTempView('ts_data')
  
result_schema =StructType([
  StructField('ds',DateType()),
  StructField('analysis_measure_id',StringType()),
  StructField('category',StringType()),
  StructField('analysis_id',StringType()),
  StructField('y',FloatType()),
  StructField('yhat',FloatType()),
  StructField('yhat_upper',FloatType()),
  StructField('yhat_lower',FloatType())
  ])
  
  
def forecast_time_series( history_pd: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
  
  # TRAIN MODEL AS BEFORE
  # --------------------------------------
  # remove missing values 
  history_pd = history_pd.dropna()
  parameters=ast.literal_eval(history_pd['json_def'].iloc[0])
  #print(parameters)
  history_pd.drop(['json_def'],axis=1)
  # configure the model
  model = Prophet(
    interval_width=float(parameters['confidenceInterval']),
    growth='linear',
    daily_seasonality=bool(distutils.util.strtobool(parameters['seasonality']['daily'])),
    weekly_seasonality=bool(distutils.util.strtobool(parameters['seasonality']['weekly'])),
    yearly_seasonality=bool(distutils.util.strtobool(parameters['seasonality']['yearly'])),
    seasonality_mode='multiplicative'
    )
  
  # train the model
  model.fit( history_pd )
  # --------------------------------------
  
  # BUILD FORECAST AS BEFORE
  # --------------------------------------
  # make predictions
  future_pd = model.make_future_dataframe(
    periods=$[future_forecast], 
    freq='d', 
    include_history=False
    )
  forecast_pd = model.predict( future_pd )  
  # --------------------------------------
  
  # ASSEMBLE EXPECTED RESULT SET
  # --------------------------------------
  # get relevant fields from forecast
  f_pd = forecast_pd[ ['ds','yhat', 'yhat_upper', 'yhat_lower'] ].set_index('ds')
  
  # get relevant fields from history
  h_pd = history_pd[['ds','analysis_measure_id','analysis_id','category','y']].set_index('ds')
  
  # join history and forecast
  results_pd = f_pd.join( h_pd, how='left' )
  results_pd.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
  
  # get store & item from incoming data set
  results_pd['analysis_measure_id'] = history_pd['analysis_measure_id'].iloc[0]
  results_pd['category'] = history_pd['category'].iloc[0]
  results_pd['analysis_id'] = history_pd['analysis_id'].iloc[0]
  # --------------------------------------
  
  
  return results_pd[ ['ds', 'analysis_measure_id','analysis_id','category', 'y', 'yhat', 'yhat_upper', 'yhat_lower'] ][-$[future_forecast]:]

results = (
  time_series_data
    .groupBy('analysis_measure_id','category')
      .applyInPandas(forecast_time_series, schema=result_schema)
    .withColumn('training_date', current_date())
    )
    
results.createOrReplaceTempView('small_ts_data')

output=spark.sql("select ds as PREDICTION_DATE ,analysis_measure_id as ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID ,category as CATEGORY,analysis_id as ANALYSIS_ID,round(yhat,3) as PREDICTED_VALUE ,round(yhat_upper,3) as UPPER_BOUND,round(yhat_lower,3) as LOWER_BOUND,training_date as RUN_DATE,3 as PREDICTION_METHOD_ID,unix_timestamp(ds) as prediction_run_id  from  small_ts_data")

output.createOrReplaceTempView('output_time_series_data')
output.cache()
output.count()
","kind":"pyspark","dataSourceId":0,"componentId":3,"componentName":"Time_Series_Modelling","tableName":"output_time_series_data","category":"Processor","componentType":"Code","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[2],"options":{},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.CodeComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"schemaName":"public","sourceDataFrame":"output_time_series_data","saveMode":"append","numPartitions":0,"mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"PREDICTION_DATE","sourceType":"date","targetColumn":"prediction_date","targetType":"timestamp without time zone"},{"sourceColumn":"ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID","sourceType":"string","targetColumn":"analysis_measure_id","targetType":"character varying"},{"sourceColumn":"CATEGORY","sourceType":"string","targetColumn":"category","targetType":"text"},{"sourceColumn":"ANALYSIS_ID","sourceType":"string","targetColumn":"analysis_id","targetType":"character varying"},{"sourceColumn":"PREDICTED_VALUE","sourceType":"float","targetColumn":"predicted_value","targetType":"numeric"},{"sourceColumn":"UPPER_BOUND","sourceType":"float","targetColumn":"upper_bound","targetType":"numeric"},{"sourceColumn":"LOWER_BOUND","sourceType":"float","targetColumn":"lower_bound","targetType":"numeric"},{"sourceColumn":"RUN_DATE","sourceType":"date","targetColumn":"run_date","targetType":"timestamp without time zone"},{"sourceColumn":"PREDICTION_METHOD_ID","sourceType":"integer","targetColumn":"prediction_method_id","targetType":"numeric"},{"sourceColumn":"prediction_run_id","sourceType":"long","targetColumn":"prediction_run_id","targetType":"numeric"}],"componentId":4,"componentName":"Save_Predictions","tableName":"t_dm_analysis_prediction_stg","category":"Sink","componentType":"DB sink","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[3],"options":{"numPartitions":"4","batchsize":"1000"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBSyncComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"dbScripts":[{"script":"do $$
<<script_block>>
begin
insert into 
T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG (
ANALYSIS_ID,
ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,
PREDICTION_RUN_ID,
PREDICTION_METHOD_ID,
CATEGORY,
PREDICTION_DATE,
PREDICTED_VALUE,
LOWER_BOUND,
UPPER_BOUND) 
select ANALYSIS_ID,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (RUN_DATE + interval '1' day) at time zone (SELECT current_setting('TIMEZONE')) at time zone 'utc') as PREDICTION_RUN_ID,4,CATEGORY,RUN_DATE + interval '1' day as RUN_DATE,ROUND(CAST(mean AS NUMERIC),3) as prediction_Value,ROUND(CAST(mean-zscore*STD_DEV AS NUMERIC),3) as lower_bound,ROUND(CAST(mean+zscore*STD_DEV AS NUMERIC),3) as upper_bound from 
(select ANALYSIS_ID,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,PREDICTION_TYPE,CATEGORY,AVG(ACTUAL_VALUE) as mean,STDDEV(ACTUAL_VALUE) as STD_DEV
,cast((case when PREDICTION_METH_DEF like '%standardDeviation%' then (PREDICTION_METH_DEF::jsonb -> 'standardDeviation') else '3' end) as float) as zscore
 , max(RUN_DATE) as RUN_DATE from 
(select ARD.ANALYSIS_ID,ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID, ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ACTUAL_VALUE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then AP.PREDICTION_TYPE else MP.PREDICTION_TYPE end as PREDICTION_TYPE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_DEF else M.PREDICTION_DEF end as PREDICTION_METH_DEF,
count(ARD.ANALYSIS_DETAIL_RUN_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID) as ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT,AR.RUN_DATE
from
T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN_DETAILS ARD,T_DM_ANALYSIS_MEASURE M, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD AP, T_DM_ANALYSIS A,T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN AR, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD MP
where
AR.ANALYSIS_ID=A.ANALYSIS_ID
and ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID=M.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = MP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = AP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID=ARD.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_ID=M.ANALYSIS_ID
and (case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_ID else M.PREDICTION_METH_ID end) = 4
and (ARD.PREDICTION_USE='Y' AND AR.PREDICTION_USE='Y')
and A.ENABLE_PREDICTION='Y' 
AND  ARD.ANALYSIS_ID=case when '$[Analysis_ID]' = 'All Analysis' then ARD.ANALYSIS_ID else '$[Analysis_ID]' end
--and a.df_id =case when '$[Dataflow_ID]' = 'All Analysis' then A.df_id else '$[Dataflow_ID]' end
) a where ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT > CAST (( case when PREDICTION_METH_DEF like '%minDataPoints%' then (PREDICTION_METH_DEF::jsonb -> 
'minDataPoints') else '3' end) as numeric)  group by CATEGORY,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,PREDICTION_TYPE,PREDICTION_METH_DEF,ANALYSIS_ID) as pred;

END script_block $$;
","executionOrder":1,"title":""}],"componentId":5,"componentName":"STD_Prediction","tableName":"STD_Prediction","category":"Processor","componentType":"DB script","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[1],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBScriptComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"dbScripts":[{"script":"do $$
<<script_block>>
begin
insert into 
T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG (
ANALYSIS_ID,
ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,
PREDICTION_RUN_ID,
PREDICTION_METHOD_ID,
CATEGORY,
PREDICTION_DATE,
PREDICTED_VALUE,
LOWER_BOUND,
UPPER_BOUND) select ANALYSIS_ID,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (RUN_DATE + interval '1' day) at time zone (SELECT current_setting('TIMEZONE')) at time zone 'utc') as PREDICTION_RUN_ID,5,CATEGORY,RUN_DATE + interval '1' day as RUN_DATE,ROUND(CAST(percentile_50 AS NUMERIC),3) as prediction_Value,ROUND(CAST((percentile_25)-IQR*(percentile_75-percentile_25) AS NUMERIC),3) as lower_bound,ROUND(CAST((percentile_75)+IQR*(percentile_75-percentile_25) AS NUMERIC),3) as upper_bound from 
(select ANALYSIS_ID,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,PREDICTION_TYPE,CATEGORY,percentile_cont(0.25) within group (order by ACTUAL_VALUE asc) as percentile_25,percentile_cont(0.50) within group (order by ACTUAL_VALUE asc) as percentile_50,percentile_cont(0.75) within group (order by ACTUAL_VALUE asc) as percentile_75
,cast((case when PREDICTION_METH_DEF like '%iqrConstant%' then (PREDICTION_METH_DEF::jsonb -> 'iqrConstant') else '1.5' end) as float) as IQR
, max(RUN_DATE) AS RUN_DATE from 
(select ARD.ANALYSIS_ID,ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID, ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ACTUAL_VALUE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then AP.PREDICTION_TYPE else MP.PREDICTION_TYPE end as PREDICTION_TYPE,
case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_DEF else M.PREDICTION_DEF end as PREDICTION_METH_DEF,
AR.RUN_DATE,
count(ARD.ANALYSIS_DETAIL_RUN_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY ARD.CATEGORY, ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID) as ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT
from
T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN_DETAILS ARD,T_DM_ANALYSIS_MEASURE M, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD AP, T_DM_ANALYSIS A,T_DM_ANALYSIS_RUN AR, T_DM_PREDICTION_METHOD MP
where
AR.ANALYSIS_ID=A.ANALYSIS_ID
and ARD.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID=M.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = MP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = AP.PREDICTION_METHOD_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID=ARD.ANALYSIS_RUN_ID
and AR.ANALYSIS_ID=M.ANALYSIS_ID
and (case when M.PREDICTION_METH_ID = 1 then A.DFLT_PREDICTION_METH_ID else M.PREDICTION_METH_ID end) = 5
and (ARD.PREDICTION_USE='Y' AND AR.PREDICTION_USE='Y')
and A.ENABLE_PREDICTION='Y' 
AND  ARD.ANALYSIS_ID=case when '$[Analysis_ID]' = 'All Analysis' then ARD.ANALYSIS_ID else '$[Analysis_ID]' end
--and a.df_id =case when '$[Dataflow_ID]' = 'All Analysis' then A.df_id else '$[Dataflow_ID]' end
) a where ANALYSIS_DETAIL_CNT > CAST (( case when PREDICTION_METH_DEF like '%minDataPoints%' then (PREDICTION_METH_DEF::jsonb -> 'minDataPoints') else '3' end) as numeric) group by CATEGORY,ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,PREDICTION_TYPE,PREDICTION_METH_DEF,ANALYSIS_ID) as pred;


END script_block $$;
","executionOrder":1,"title":""}],"componentId":6,"componentName":"IQR_Prediction","tableName":"IQR_Prediction","category":"Processor","componentType":"DB script","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[1],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBScriptComponent","excludeNotification":"N"},{"dbScripts":[{"script":"
do $$
begin
declare
v_script character varying;
v_count numeric;
partition_tab_name character varying(50);

begin
	SELECT REPLACE ('$[Analysis_ID]', '-', '_') into partition_tab_name;

v_script:='select count(*)  from pg_class where relname = ''t_dm_prediction_'||partition_tab_name||'''';
execute v_script into v_count;if(v_count=0)
then
v_script := 'CREATE TABLE t_dm_prediction_'||partition_tab_name||' PARTITION OF T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION FOR VALUES IN ('||'''$[Analysis_ID]'''||')';
execute v_script;
end if;
end;
end$$;","executionOrder":1,"title":""},{"script":"do $$
<<script_block>>
begin
insert into T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION 
(analysis_prediction_id,
 prediction_run_id,
 analysis_measure_id,
 prediction_method_id,
 CATEGORY,
 PREDICTION_DATE,
 PREDICTED_VALUE,
 LOWER_BOUND,
 UPPER_BOUND,ANALYSIS_ID)
select nextval('s_prediction_id'),
PREDICTION_RUN_ID,
ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID,
PREDICTION_METHOD_id,
CATEGORY,
PREDICTION_DATE,
PREDICTED_VALUE,
LOWER_BOUND,
UPPER_BOUND,ANALYSIS_ID from T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG where ANALYSIS_ID='$[Analysis_ID]';
END script_block $$;","executionOrder":2,"title":""},{"script":"do $$
<<script_block>>
begin
DELETE from T_DM_PREDICTION_RUN PR where EXISTS (Select 1 from (select DISTINCT AP.PREDICTION_RUN_ID,AM.ANALYSIS_ID,AP.PREDICTION_DATE from T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG AP,T_DM_ANALYSIS_MEASURE AM where AP.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID=AM.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID) AP where AP.prediction_run_id=PR.prediction_run_id and AP.prediction_date=PR.prediction_date and AP.ANALYSIS_ID=PR.ANALYSIS_ID);

insert into T_DM_PREDICTION_RUN (PREDICTION_RUN_ID,ANALYSIS_ID,PREDICTION_DATE) select DISTINCT AP.PREDICTION_RUN_ID,AM.ANALYSIS_ID,AP.PREDICTION_DATE from T_DM_ANALYSIS_PREDICTION_STG AP,T_DM_ANALYSIS_MEASURE AM where AP.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID=AM.ANALYSIS_MEASURE_ID;

END script_block $$;","executionOrder":3,"title":""}],"componentId":7,"componentName":"Save_data_into_prediction_table","tableName":"Merge_data_into_prediction_table","category":"Processor","componentType":"DB script","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"PostgreSQLrep","displayRows":10,"dependencies":[4,5,6],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.DBScriptComponent","excludeNotification":"N"}],"isDeleteWorkSchemaTable":"N"}
